title: (x) Gregory Dickow - Requiem {Eduardo}
content:
am slowly losing my mind trying to id this font... it looks so familiar, yes?   
   
please post your answer here   
   
thanks ![gregory dickow face](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000053im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/14804.jpg)
author: thomjonborges

comments.content: It's Requiem, by Jonathan Hoefler, I think.
Eduardo... so right you are! Bravo! Many thanks!
